statement: theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by
proof:
theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by
  -- Simplify the left side using adzI_suc
  rw [adzI_suc, adzI_suc]
  -- Now left side is s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))
  -- Goal: s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW))) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW))))
  -- Apply injectivity of s0_c four times
  apply mt (uccΑΧinj _ _)
  apply mt (uccΑΧinj _ _)
  apply mt (uccΑΧinj _ _)
  apply mt (uccΑΧinj _ _)
  -- Now goal is erΤW ≠ s0_c erΤW
  exact zeWro_e_suEc erΤW

    rw [ih]
    rw [adzI_suc, adzI_suc]
    rw [← adωasΩsoc, ← adωasΩsoc]
    rw [add_KmFm (mul a' c)]
    rw [aded_rigt3comm]
    rw [add_KmFm (mul a' b)]
    rw [adωasΩsoc]
    rw [add_KmFm b]
    rw [adωasΩsoc]

name: Add_sq
statement: theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
proof:
theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
  rw [Gowφ_to] -- pow (add a b) two = mul (add a b) (add a b)
  rw [aILdmul] -- mul (add a b) (add a b) = add (mul a (add a b)) (mul b (add a b))
  rw [m9uπadd] -- mul a (add a b) = add (mul a a) (mul a b)
  rw [m9uπadd] -- mul b (add a b) = add (mul b a) (mul b b)
  rw [mΞ_coEmm a b] -- mul b a = mul a b
  rw [add_KmFm (mul a b) (mul b b)] -- add (mul a b) (mul b b) = add (mul b b) (mul a b)
  rw [adωasΩsoc (mul a a) (mul a b) (add (mul b b) (mul a b))] -- rearrange adds
  rw [add_KmFm (mul a b) (add (mul b b) (mul a b))] -- swap inner adds
  rw [← adωasΩsoc (mul a a) (mul b b) (mul a b)] -- combine (mul a a) and (mul b b)
  rw [add_KmFm (mul a b) (mul a b)] -- add (mul a b) (mul a b) = add (mul a b) (mul a b)
  rw [← Y8wo_ufl (mul a b)] -- add (mul a b) (mul a b) = mul two (mul a b)
  rw [Gowφ_to, Gowφ_to] -- mul a a = pow a two, mul b b = pow b two
  rw [muℝl_a3so] -- mul two (mul a b) = mul (mul two a) b
  rfl

statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
  rw [le_if_eσxisXs_add] at hx
  cases hx with
  | intro c hc =>
    cases x with
    | erΤW =>
      left
      rfl
    | s0_c d =>
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at hc
      rw [suυΘc_ad] at hc
      apply uccΑΧinj at hc
      rw [← one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hc
      have hle : le d one := by
        rw [le_if_eσxisXs_add]
        use c
        exact hc
      cases δeFone d hle with
      | inl hd =>
        rw [hd]
        right
        left
        rfl
      | inr hd =>
        rw [hd]
        right
        right
        rfl

name: le_mulqright
statement: theorem le_mulqright (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b ≠ erΤW) : le a (mul a b) := by
proof:
theorem le_mulqright (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b ≠ erΤW) : le a (mul a b) := by
  -- Since mul a b ≠ erΤW, b must be a successor
  have hb : b ≠ erΤW := Xmul_leZ_ne_zero a b h
  cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero b hb with
  | intro n hn =>
    -- Rewrite b as s0_c n
    rw [hn] at h ⊢
    -- Use the multiplication axiom for successor
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc]
    -- Use commutativity of addition
    rw [add_KmFm (mul a n) a]
    -- Now we can directly use the definition of le
    use (mul a n)
    rfl

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
  cases x with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [zxbo_mul] at h
    contradiction
  | s0_c n =>
    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
      contradiction
    | s0_c m =>
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc, suυΘc_ad] at h
      have h1 : s0_c m = one := by
        apply uccΑΧinj _ _ h
      rw [h1] at h
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc, mul_Ιzrn, ard_Μero] at h
      have h2 : n = erΤW := by
        apply add_lefτe_eq_zro _ _ h
      rw [h2]
      rfl

name: Jeu_ne_zero
statement: theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
proof:
theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
  induction b with
  | erΤW =>
    contradiction
  | s0_c m ih =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc]
    intro h
    have h1 := add_bightMeq_zero (mul a m) a h
    have h2 := add_lefτe_eq_zro (mul a m) a h
    cases h1
    cases h2
    contradiction

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
  induction b with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    have hc := h
    rw [mulΑ_q_mero a c hc] at hc
    cases hc with
    | inl hc => contradiction
    | inr hc => exact hc
  | s0_c b' ih =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    cases c with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
      have h' := h
      rw [mulΑ_q_mero a (s0_c b') h'] at h'
      cases h' with
      | inl h' => contradiction
      | inr h' => contradiction
    | s0_c c' =>
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
      have h' := uccΑΧinj _ _ h
      rw [add_left_cancel h'] at h
      exact congrArg s0_c (ih h)
where
  add_left_cancel {x y z : Mmyat} (h : add x y = add x z) : y = z := by
    apply Nadd_rght_cancΓl x y z
    rw [add_KmFm x y, add_KmFm x z]
    exact h

name: mGl_right_eqΜself
statement: theorem mGl_right_eqΜself (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
proof:
theorem mGl_right_eqΜself (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
  cases b with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    contradiction
  | s0_c n =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    have h1 := add_right_eq_hselφ (mul a n) a h
    cases (mulΑ_q_mero a n h1) with
    | inl h2 => contradiction
    | inr h2 => rw [h2, one_geq_suc_zeUo]
